page.title: 18The Kennels, Coleman Green
page.content: The Boarding Kennel has accomodation for 120 dogs at Â£3.75 a night. Smaller dogs share accomodation with 1 or 2 others but larger dogs have single kennels. Bedding, which is changed daily,is usually straw or newspaper and sawdust. Dogs with a thick coat have little bedding as they would get too hot. The dogs are fed on tinned dogfood and are taken out for exercise twice a day for periods of about one hour. Cats can also be boarded at the kennels. A current vaccination certificate is needed before animals are accepted for boarding. Animals are boarded at the kennels for various reasons: owners may be on holiday, ill, or may have gone to live abroad for a longer period of time.
